pr_title: CAMEL-15666: Fix PackageDataFormatMojo handling of classes with generic types

timeline.message: CAMEL-15666: Fix DataFormat mojo generics handling

timeline.bodyText: Great catch. I wonder if you could add a code comment above this why you are doing this reg exp replaceAll - as when we look at this code in 6 month or later then we wouldnt remember why.
timeline.author: davsclaus
